#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

A simple game to test your wits. 


= Details =
Instructions:

Get to the menu bar to start a new one-player or two-player game. Players take turns. Doubletap a square to mark it and begin playing. Make rows, columns, or diagonals of exactly 3, 6, or 9 to score. Highest score wins.
